meanings.definition: In a fussy manner; with excessive attention to detail or unnecessary fuss.
meanings.sent1: She cleaned her room fussily, arranging every toy meticulously.
meanings.sent2: He always eats his food fussily, picking out every tiny vegetable.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched fussily as its owner tried to make the bed with its favorite blanket.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked fussily, as if each second was a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The teacher corrected the students' work fussily, circling every mistake.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive attention to detail or unnecessary fuss.
meanings.sent1: The fussily decorated cake had intricate icing designs.
meanings.sent2: She always wore fussily matched outfits, down to the smallest accessory.
meanings.sent3: The fussily arranged flowers in the vase seemed to be posing for a photo.
meanings.sent4: His fussily organized desk looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The fussily folded origami cranes filled the room with delicate beauty.
